The small foxbot looked back and fourth between Drillbit and 
KitKat, "I don't suppose you'd believe that I just happened to be in 
the neighborhood and thought I'd stop by?" he knew they wouldn't 
believe it. "How about I was thinking about buying a ship like this 
and wanted to test the legroom." That wouldn't go over to well. He 
didn't know what to say. he couldn't use the truth 

 he thought about the truth "I was on my hoverboard on my way back to 
veratis with the stolen DNA from various maximals and decided to stop 
by and see what I could steel frim you. He'd only say that if he 
wanted to commit suicide.

He decided to try to change the subject again. "Do any of us truly 
know why we're here?" Isn't that the mysterie of the universe?" he 
sat forward looking at his two hosts eye to eye "If I had the answer 
to that I wouldn't have to be on this planet. I'd be teaching the 
laws of Physics at an acadamy somewhere."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:

>

would 
> you be so kind as to tell me why you decided to walk in here and 
not 
> announce yourself?"
>
